code: import{USER_SET_USER,USER_SET_AUTH,USER_SET_LOADING,USER_SET_ERROR}from"../types/actions/user";export var setCurrentUser=function setCurrentUser(user,secret){if(secret==="test"){return function(dispatch){dispatch(setUser(user));dispatch(setAuth(true));};}else{return function(dispatch){dispatch(setError(true));};}};export var setUser=function setUser(data){return{type:USER_SET_USER,data:data};};export var setAuth=function setAuth(data){return{type:USER_SET_AUTH,data:data};};export var setLoading=function setLoading(){var loading=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:true;return{type:USER_SET_LOADING,loading:loading};};export var setError=function setError(data){return{type:USER_SET_ERROR,data:data};};
